QuestData.Title: Eyes on the Skies
QuestData.Description:
You have made a great deal of progress with Kua'fon. He may not yet possess de power of flight, but he is healthy and growing.
Take de success you have made and build upon it, $n. Do not let Pa'ku's lesson dishearten you.
Continue to do as you have been. Nurture Kua'fon, build his confidence in his wings. Show him de way forward and he will reward you with a bond stronger than any you have ever known.
When his wings are large enough to shade you, we will try again.
QuestData.LogDescription: Tend to Kua'fon until he is fully grown.
